description: METAVIR is a web server designed to annotate viral metagenomic sequences (raw reads or assembled contigs). A set of published viromes, identified as "public projects", is already available, and your own data sets can be processed in a private environment.

components.data: Contigs: Taxonomic composition
components.name: Section

components.data:
Three types of taxonomic composition are computed for contigs: 

Predicted gene best Blast hit
Contig best BLAST hit
Contig lowest common ancestor
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Three types of taxonomic composition are computed for contigs: 

Predicted gene best Blast hit
Contig best BLAST hit
Contig lowest common ancestor
